summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2362, for the improvement of Crawford Place in the City of Seattle from East Union Street to East Pine Street, by grading the same, by paving the same with brick or some other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, by the construction of sewers with their appurtenances necessary and for the proper surface drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 24670 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
